meanings: (힘·세력 등이) weak, feeble, light, (바람 등이) gentle

vlive.korean: 약하고 쳐진 피부에, 수분과 탄력성을 더해주죠. To add moisture, plumped elasticity to your weak and sagging skin . 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV
